document_data.name: Temple of Yondalla
document_data.organizations: Organizations in the Temple of Yondalla (Ammathluir)
document_data.mainbody: The '''Temple of Yondalla''' was a temple devoted to [[Yondalla]], the [[halfling]] Protector and Provider, located in the city of [[Ammathluir]] in central [[Luiren]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The temple was built into a hillside and was rather small.
